description.value:
Metallic Pouch containing one complete meal alongside vitamin supplements, salt, water purification tablets, a protein bar, and minor medical supplies. No cooking required but somewhat advised to get some level of taste out of the otherwise tasteless meal. Not advised for long term use.

Requirements

One day's worth of food for one person

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 2 T
